Summary: went from west to east the UFO was moving pretty fast i have a video of it.
divs: Sighting Detailsi seen this UFO for 3 days know going in the same way every time trying to get a better video of it but i dont have a night vision camera.i was standing in my back yard looking for a UFO and then for some resone i turned around then there it was tryed to get it on video but i didnt get it it was going to fast the second night it came at the same time between 7-9pm i got it on the second night and the third night night which is 1-28-2012 i seen it again same direction same speed but i couldnt get to the camera in time.i hope you can clarify the video better.
